```diff
  import { ref } from 'vue'
  const playbackSpeed = ref(1)
+ const bagFile = ref<File|null>(null)
+ const allTopics = ref([
+   '/camera/front',
+   '/lidar/points',
+   '/can_bus',
+   '/imu/data',
+   '/gps/fix',
+   '/radar/objects',
+   '/perception/obstacles'
+ ])
+ const selectedTopics = ref<string[]>(['/camera/front', '/lidar/points'])
+ const isPlaying = ref(false)
+ const progress = ref(0)
+ const events = ref<any[]>([])
+ 
+ function onBagFileChange(e: Event) {
+   const input = e.target as HTMLInputElement
+   if (input.files && input.files.length > 0) {
+     bagFile.value = input.files[0]
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ function handleStart() {
+   isPlaying.value = true
+   progress.value = 0
+   // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå›æ”¾è¿›åº¦
+   const interval = setInterval(() => {
+     if (!isPlaying.value) {
+       clearInterval(interval)
+       return
+     }
+     if (progress.value < 100) {
+       progress.value += 2
+       // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå…³é”®äº‹ä»¶è‡ªåŠ¨æå–
+       if (progress.value === 20) {
+         events.value.push({ type: 'ä¿¡å·è§¦å‘', timestamp: '00:00:12', desc: 'æ£€æµ‹åˆ°çº¢ç¯' })
+       }
+       if (progress.value === 60) {
+         events.value.push({ type: 'äº‹ä»¶èšåˆ', timestamp: '00:00:38', desc: 'å‰æ–¹æœ‰è¡Œäººç©¿è¶Š' })
+       }
+     } else {
+       isPlaying.value = false
+       clearInterval(interval)
+     }
+   }, 300)
+ }
+ 
+ function handlePause() {
+   isPlaying.value = false
+ }
+ 
+ function handleStop() {
+   isPlaying.value = false
+   progress.value = 0
+ }
+ 
+ function handleExtract() {
+   // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨åç«¯APIè¿›è¡Œäº‹ä»¶æå–
+   alert('å·²è‡ªåŠ¨æå–å…³é”®äº‹ä»¶å¹¶åˆ†å‰²bagç‰‡æ®µ')
```

```diff
  import { ref } from 'vue'

-   key: ''

- const handleSync = () => {

+ const simConfig = ref({
+   model: 'bicycle',
+   duration: 60,
+   step: 10
+ })
+ const simStatus = ref<'idle'|'running'|'paused'|'completed'>('idle')
+ const simProgress = ref(0)
+ const simStatusLabel = computed(() => {
+   if (simStatus.value === 'idle') return 'å°±ç»ª'
+   if (simStatus.value === 'running') return 'è¿è¡Œä¸­'
+   if (simStatus.value === 'paused') return 'å·²æš‚åœ'
+   if (simStatus.value === 'completed') return 'å·²å®Œæˆ'
+   return ''
+ })
+ let simTimer: any = null
+ 
+ const controlSignals = ref<any[]>([])
+ const vehicleStates = ref<any[]>([])
+ const analysis = ref({
+   maxError: 0.25,
+   avgError: 0.12,
+   successRate: 98.5
+ })
+ 
+ const handleStartSim = () => {
+   simStatus.value = 'running'
+   simProgress.value = 0
+   controlSignals.value = []
+   vehicleStates.value = []
+   let t = 0
+   simTimer = setInterval(() => {
+     if (simStatus.value !== 'running') return
+     t += simConfig.value.step / 1000
+     simProgress.value = Math.min(100, Math.round((t / simConfig.value.duration) * 100))
+     // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¿¡å·å’ŒçŠ¶æ€
+     controlSignals.value.push({ time: t.toFixed(2), steer: (Math.sin(t)*10).toFixed(2), acc: (Math.cos(t)*2).toFixed(2) })
+     vehicleStates.value.push({ time: t.toFixed(2), x: (t*2).toFixed(2), y: (Math.sin(t)*5).toFixed(2), v: (10+Math.cos(t)).toFixed(2), error: (Math.abs(Math.sin(t)/4)).toFixed(3) })
+     if (simProgress.value >= 100) {
+       simStatus.value = 'completed'
+       clearInterval(simTimer)
+     }
+   }, simConfig.value.step)
+ }
+ const handlePauseSim = () => {
+   if (simStatus.value === 'running') simStatus.value = 'paused'
+ }
+ const handleStopSim = () => {
+   simStatus.value = 'idle'
+   simProgress.value = 0
+   clearInterval(simTimer)
  }
-   }, 500)
+ const exportResult = () => {
+   alert('å¯¼å‡ºä»¿çœŸç»“æœï¼ˆå¯æ‰©å±•ä¸ºä¸‹è½½CSV/JSONç­‰ï¼‰')
  }
```

```diff
+   const i = Math.floor(Math.log(bytes) / Math.log(k))
+   return parseFloat((bytes / Math.pow(k, i)).toFixed(2)) + ' ' + sizes[i]
+ }
```

```diff
+           <button class="screenshot-btn" @click="takeScreenshot">
+             æˆªå–ç”»é¢
+           </button>
+         </div>
+ 
+         <div class="data-comparison">
+           <h3>æ•°æ®å¯¹æ¯”</h3>
+           <div class="comparison-controls">
+             <button class="compare-btn" @click="toggleComparison">
+               {{ showComparison ? 'å…³é—­å¯¹æ¯”' : 'å¼€å¯å¯¹æ¯”' }}
+             </button>
+             <div v-if="showComparison" class="comparison-view">
+               <div class="original-data">
+                 <h4>åŸå§‹æ•°æ®</h4>
+                 <div class="data-metrics">
+                   <div class="metric">
+                     <span>å¸§ç‡:</span>
+                     <span>{{ originalData.fps }}fps</span>
+                   </div>
+                   <div class="metric">
+                     <span>å»¶è¿Ÿ:</span>
+                     <span>{{ originalData.latency }}ms</span>
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+               </div>
+               <div class="playback-data">
+                 <h4>å›æ”¾æ•°æ®</h4>
+                 <div class="data-metrics">
+                   <div class="metric">
+                     <span>å¸§ç‡:</span>
+                     <span>{{ playbackData.fps }}fps</span>
+                   </div>
+                   <div class="metric">
+                     <span>å»¶è¿Ÿ:</span>
+                     <span>{{ playbackData.latency }}ms</span>
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+   </div>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { ref, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue'
+ 
+ // è§†é¢‘æ’­æ”¾ç›¸å…³
+ const videoPlayer = ref<HTMLVideoElement | null>(null)
+ const isPlaying = ref(false)
+ const playbackSpeed = ref('1')
+ const currentVideo = ref('')
+ 
+ // å½•åˆ¶ç›¸å…³
+ const isRecording = ref(false)
+ const recordingStartTime = ref(0)
+ 
+ // æ•°æ®å¯¹æ¯”ç›¸å…³
+ const showComparison = ref(false)
+ const originalData = ref({
+   fps: 30,
+   latency: 16
+ })
+ const playbackData = ref({
+   fps: 30,
+   latency: 16
+ })
+ 
+ // å›¾å±‚æ§åˆ¶
+ const layers = ref([
+   { id: 'camera', name: 'æ‘„åƒå¤´è§†å›¾', visible: true },
+   { id: 'lidar', name: 'æ¿€å…‰é›·è¾¾ç‚¹äº‘', visible: true },
+   { id: 'radar', name: 'æ¯«ç±³æ³¢é›·è¾¾', visible: true },
+   { id: 'gps', name: 'GPSè½¨è¿¹', visible: true },
+   { id: 'imu', name: 'IMUæ•°æ®', visible: true }
+ ])
+ 
+ // æ’­æ”¾æ§åˆ¶æ–¹æ³•
+ const togglePlay = () => {
+   if (videoPlayer.value) {
+     if (isPlaying.value) {
+       videoPlayer.value.pause()
+     } else {
+       videoPlayer.value.play()
+     }
+     isPlaying.value = !isPlaying.value
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const stepForward = () => {
+   if (videoPlayer.value) {
+     videoPlayer.value.currentTime += 1
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const stepBackward = () => {
+   if (videoPlayer.value) {
+     videoPlayer.value.currentTime -= 1
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å½•åˆ¶æ§åˆ¶æ–¹æ³•
+ const toggleRecording = () => {
+   isRecording.value = !isRecording.value
+   if (isRecording.value) {
+     recordingStartTime.value = Date.now()
+     // å¼€å§‹å½•åˆ¶é€»è¾‘
+   } else {
+     // åœæ­¢å½•åˆ¶é€»è¾‘
+     const duration = Date.now() - recordingStartTime.value
+     console.log(`å½•åˆ¶æ—¶é•¿: ${duration}ms`)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æˆªå›¾æ–¹æ³•
+ const takeScreenshot = () => {
+   if (videoPlayer.value) {
+     const canvas = document.createElement('canvas')
+     canvas.width = videoPlayer.value.videoWidth
+     canvas.height = videoPlayer.value.videoHeight
+     const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d')
+     if (ctx) {
+       ctx.drawImage(videoPlayer.value, 0, 0)
+       const link = document.createElement('a')
+       link.download = `screenshot-${Date.now()}.png`
+       link.href = canvas.toDataURL()
+       link.click()
+     }
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æ•°æ®å¯¹æ¯”æ–¹æ³•
+ const toggleComparison = () => {
+   showComparison.value = !showComparison.value
+ }
+ 
+ // ç›‘å¬æ’­æ”¾é€Ÿåº¦å˜åŒ–
+ watch(playbackSpeed, (newSpeed) => {
+   if (videoPlayer.value) {
+     videoPlayer.value.playbackRate = parseFloat(newSpeed)
+   }
+ })
+ 
+ onMounted(() => {
+   // åˆå§‹åŒ–å›¾è¡¨ç­‰
+ })
+ 
+ onUnmounted(() => {
+   // æ¸…ç†èµ„æº
+ })
+ </script>
+
```

```diff
+ function getLocalIP() {
+   const { networkInterfaces } = require('os');
+   const nets = networkInterfaces();
+   const results = {};
+ 
+   for (const name of Object.keys(nets)) {
+     for (const net of nets[name]) {

+       if (net.family === 'IPv4' && !net.internal) {
```
